Layanan Dukcapil Bener Meriah "Si Peling" Tembus Samar Kilang.
02 Nov 2019, 21:50 by Bambang Syahputra



Layanan Dukcapil Bener Meriah "Si Peling" Tembus Samar Kilang.



Layanan Dukcapil Bener Meriah "Si Peling" Tembus Samar Kilang.


KBRN, Redelong: Dalam rangka peningkatan kepemilikan dokumen kependudukan khususnya KTP elektronik dan dokumen kependudukan lainnya, Dukcapil Bener Meriah melalui inovasi Sistem Pelayanan Keliling "Si PELING" menembus pelosok kecamatan terpencil yaitu Kecamatan Syiah Utama.
“Dengan fasilitas unit mobil keliling, tim Si PELING telah tiba di sana dan akan melakukan pelayanan administrasi kependudukan (adminduk) selama dua hari, pada 2-3 November 2019 di Kantor Camat Syiah Utama dan Desa Rusip,” Kata Kepala Dinas Kependudukan dan Pencatatan Sipil Kabupaten Bener Meriah, Ikhwanul Hakim, Sabtu (2/11/2019)
Lanjut menjelaskan, kegiatan tersebut menurutnya merupakan lanjutan dari program jemput bola yang digagas Dukcapil Bener Meriah melalui Pelayanan Langsung kepada masyarakat mulai dari Ibu Kota Kabupaten sampai ke pelosok wilayah Bener Meriah.
Sementara itu, Pejabat Pengaduan Pelayanan Publik Disdukcapil Bener Meriah, Eriyanto Abduh Yunus, mengutarakan, ke depan pihaknya akan terus meningkatkan model pelayanan tersebut untuk memastikan seluruh penduduk Bener Meriah dapat memperoleh dan memiliki dokumen kependudukan dengan cara yang sangat mudah, praktis dan tanpa biaya atau gratis.

Dukcapil Bener Meriah's "Si Peling" Services Translucent Samar Refinery.
02 Nov 2019, 21:50 by Bambang Syahputra



Dukcapil Bener Meriah's "Si Peling" Services Translucent Samar Refinery.



Dukcapil Bener Meriah's "Si Peling" Services Translucent Samar Refinery.


KBRN, Redelong: In the context of increasing ownership of population documents, especially electronic ID cards and other population documents, Dukcapil Bener Meriah through the innovation of "Si PELING" Mobile Service System penetrates remote remote sub-districts namely Syiah Utama District.
"With the mobile car unit facility, the PELING team has arrived there and will conduct population administration services (adminduk) for two days, on November 2-3, 2019 at the Main Shiite Sub-District Office and Rusip Village," said the Head of the Population and Civil Registry Office Bener Meriah Regency, Ikhwanul Hakim, Saturday (11/02/2019)
He continued, according to him, the activity was a continuation of the ball pick-up program initiated by Dukcapil Bener Meriah through Direct Services to the community starting from the District Capital to remote areas of Bener Meriah.
Meanwhile, the Public Service Complaints Officer of Disdukcapil Bener Meriah, Eriyanto Abduh Yunus, said that in the future it would continue to improve the service model to ensure that all Bener Meriah residents could obtain and possess population documents in a very easy, practical and free or free way .
